entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry is sitting on a bench and having a conversation with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is sitting next to Harry on the bench and asking him about his scar.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a person who works in an office where Harry's scar hurts.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is likely Voldemort, the main antagonist of the story.

relationships.description: Harry visited Umbridge's office where his scar hurt.
You-Know-Who was angry at Harry because of the pain in his scar.
